aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request

ecs:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

ecs:capacityProvider.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS capacity provider

ecs:cluster.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS cluster

ecs:containerInstances.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS container instance

ecs:containerName.description: Filters access by the name of an Amazon ECS container which is defined in the ECS task definition

ecs:enableExecuteCommand.description: Filters access by the execute-command capability of your Amazon ECS task or Amazon ECS service

ecs:service.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS service

ecs:task.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS task

ecs:taskDefinition.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS task definition
